name: Spiritual Music Generator
description:
Spiritual Music Generator infinitely generates consonant counterpoint based on a 4-note gesture inputted by a user. This build was designed as a portfolio piece to showcase both my knowledge of music theory, and my ability to design, develop, and implement C# scripts in Unity from scratch. 

A version of this generator could easily be adapted for any project that needs background music for a temple, cathedral –or any sanctuary archetype, whether it be sacred, secular, or undefined.

Website / Demo Reel: mikeromaniak.com
